name: Axe Girl: Chop Til You Drop
name_original: Axe Girl: Chop Til You Drop
description: STUPID MONSTERS, GET OFF MY LAWN!!! Help Axela fight off hoards of enemies. Avoid getting killed or letting enemies past the fences for as long as possible and go for a high score! This game was made to celebrate the first anniversary of Axe Girl on steam, get it here.
